title: ACCOUNTING
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes including Economics/Accounting/Business/Management. NCE merit in a relevant field. HND/ND/OND in Accounting, Economics, and Business Management or any related course.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics/Accounting/Commerce and two (2) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Mathematics/Economics, and two other Social Science subjects.

title: ANATOMY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Biology, Chemistry and Physics/Mathematics in addition to the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics.

title: ARABIC & ISLAMIC STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Same as in Arabic Studies
subjects: Same as in Arabic Studies

title: ARABIC STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Arabic and any other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Arabic and three (3) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Arabic and two (2) subjects from Arts and/or Social Sciences.

title: BIOCHEMISTRY
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics and Biology.

 

NCE/ND/HND in related programmes plus the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics and Biology.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics.

title: BIOLOGICAL SCIENCE(S)
de_requirements:
(i)    Two (2) 'A' Level passes to include one (1) of Botany, Zoology, Biology or Chemistry.

 

(ii)    ND/NCE in related programme/subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology and any other Science subject.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics or Mathematics.

title: BIOLOGY
de_requirements:
i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes from Chemistry, Biology, Botany/Zoology.

(ii) NCE merit accepted.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Biology, Chemistry and Mathematics/Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics or Mathematics.

title: BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes including Economics/Commerce/Accounting and any Social Science or Art subject. ND/HND/NCE in Business Administration or Management and Purchasing and Supplies or any related field.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics/Commerce/Accounting and two (2) other Social Science or Arts subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics/Commerce and any other Social Science or Art subject

title: BUSINESS EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes or NCE merit in two (2) relevant subjects.

(ii) NCE merit in Business Education Double Major.
utme_requirements: Five (5) TC II merit, 'O' Level or NTC/NBC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other subjects in the Social Sciences or Arts. For NBC, the other subjects could be from any of the following: Commerce, Office Practice, Principles of Accounts, Secretarial Duties, Typewriting and Shorthand.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics plus one (1) of Literature in English, History, Government, Geography, Chemistry and Physics.

title: CHEMISTRY
de_requirements:
i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and any one (1) of Physics, Mathematics or Biology.

 

(ii)   ND/NCE with good grades in relevant 'O' Level subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Chemistry and two (2) of Physics, Biology and Mathematics.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
de_requirements:
)       Two (2) 'A' Level passes in science subjects including Mathematics

 

(ii)   NCE merit in Mathematics and one (1) other Science or Social Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Physics plus two (2) other Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and one (1) of Biology, Chemistry, Agric Science, Economics and Geography.

title: ECONOMICS
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes in Economics and any one of Mathematics, Statistics, Geography, Physics, Chemistry,  Accounting and Business Management. ND/NCE in a relevant field.
utme_requirements: Five (5)SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any two (2) of Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and any Social Science subject.

title: EDUCATION & ARABIC
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes or NCE in relevant subjects including Arabic.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes in relevant subjects including English Language and Arabic.
subjects: Arabic and any two (2) relevant Arts/Social Science subjects.

title: EDUCATION & BIOLOGY
de_requirements: NCE/'A' Level passes in Biology and one (1) other Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Biology, Chemistry, Mathematics and one (1) other subject.
subjects: Biology and two (2) other subjects from Chemistry, Mathematics and Physics.

title: EDUCATION & CHEMISTRY
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level/NCE passes including Chemistry and one (1) other Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credits in Mathematics, Chemistry, English Language and two (2) of Physics, Biology and Agricultural Science.
subjects: Chemistry and two (2) other subjects chosen from Physics, Biology and Mathematics.

title: EDUCATION & ECONOMICS
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Economics and one (1) other relevant subject.

(ii) NCE merit/credit in Economics and one (1) other subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language, Economics and Mathematics.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and one (1) other subject from Geography/Physics, History, Government and Literature in English.

title: EDUCATION & ENGLISH LANGUAGE
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant teaching subjects including Literature in English.

(ii)  NCE credit or merit in two(2)relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language and Literature in English plus three (3) other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Literature in English and one (1) Art and any other subject.

title: EDUCATION & GEOGRAPHY
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes/NCE merit which should include Geography

/Physics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Geography, English Language and Mathematics.
subjects: Geography plus two (2) other Social Sciences/Arts subjects.

title: EDUCATION & HISTORY
de_requirements: Two (2) NCE merit/'A' Level passes in History/Government/Civic Education and one (1) other relevant Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, History/Government/Civic Education and three (3) relevant Arts or social science subjects.
subjects: History/Government/Civic Education and any other two (2) subjects chosen from Christian Religious Studies / Islamic Studies, Arabic, Literature in English, French, Yoruba, Geography/Physics, Economics, Government and Hausa.

title: EDUCATION & ISLAMIC STUDIES
de_requirements:
(i) NCE merit in Islamic Studies and Education.

 

(ii) 'A' Level passes in Arabic/ Islamic Studies and any other relevant subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Islamic Studies and three (3) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Islamic Studies/Arabic and two (2) other Social Science or Arts subjects.

title: EDUCATION & PHYSICS
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics.

(ii) NCE credit/merit in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credits passes to include English Language, Physics, Mathematics and two (2) other Science subjects or NTC/NBC.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics or Chemistry plus one (1) other subjects.

title: EDUCATION ARTS
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant subject/NCE merit
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes in relevant subjects including English Language, Mathematics and subject of specialization.
subjects: Subject of specialization and any two (2) Arts subjects.

title: ENGLISH LANGUAGE
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes to include Literature in English and one other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Literature in English, English Language and three other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Literature in English, one other Arts subject and another Arts or Social Science subject.

title: GEOGRAPHY
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes in Geography and any one of Economics., Government, Physics, Chemistry, Biology, and Mathematics
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Geography, and any three (3) from Arts or Social Science subjects with at least a pass in Mathematics.
subjects: Geography and two (2) other Arts or Social Science subjects

title: GEOLOGY
de_requirements: (i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes from Geology, Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics, Biology and Geography.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Biology, Chemistry, Mathematics and any other subject.
subjects: Any three (3) of Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics, Biology and Geography.

title: HAUSA
de_requirements: Two (2) A’ Level passes in Hausa and any other relevant subject. NCE merit in Hausa or any relevant field. HND/Diploma in a related course.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language and Hausa and any 3 Arts or Social Science subjects
subjects: Hausa, and any two Arts or Social Science subjects.

title: HISTORY
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in History/Government/Civic Education and any other related subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include History/Government/Civic Education, English Language and 3 Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: History/Government/Civic Education and any other two (2) subjects from Arts and Social Sciences.

title: ISLAMIC STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ level passes to include Islamic Studies/Arabic and other Arts or Social Science subject. NCE merit in Islamic Studies or any relevant field. HND/Diploma in a relevant course
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language and Islamic Studies or Arabic and any three (3) relevant subjects.
subjects: Islamic Studies/Arabic plus two (2) other Arts or Social Science subjects.

title: LAW
de_requirements:
Two (2)'A' Level passes in Arts or Social Science subjects.

(ii)   NCE/ND/First Degree (Second Class Lower).
utme_requirements: Five (5)'O' Level credit passes to include English Language, Literature in English and Mathematics.
subjects: Any three (3) Arts or Social Science subjects.

title: LINGUISTICS/ARABIC
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Arabic and any other Arts Social Science subject. NCE merit in a relevant field. HND/Diploma in a related course.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Arabic and three (3) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Arabic and two (2) subjects from Arts and/or Social Sciences.

title: LINGUISTICS/ENGLISH
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes to include in English Language and one other Arts  or Social Science subject. NCE merit in a relevant field. HND/Diploma in a related course.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language and 4 other Arts Social Science subjects.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects from Arts or Social Science.

title: LINGUISTICS/HAUSA
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes including Hausa and one other Art subject. NCE merit in a relevant field. HND/Diploma in a related course,
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including Hausa and English Language plus three other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Hausa and any other two (2) subjects from Arts and Social Sciences.

title: MATHEMATICS
de_requirements:
) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Mathematics and any other science subject.

(ii)           NCE merit in Mathematics and one (1) of Physics, Chemistry or Economics
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics and Physics or Chemistry.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry and Economics or Geography.

title: MEDICINE & SURGERY
de_requirements:
(i) 'A' Level passes in Physics, Chemistry and Biology or Zoology in addition to the UTME requirements.

(ii) BSC, BOS, etc in relevant programme.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

title: MICROBIOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in any of Chemistry, Biology, Zoology, Botany and Mathematics. NCE/HND/Diploma merit/lower credit and above in Biology/ Microbiology/SLT or any related field plus UTME requirement.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology and Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and either Physics or Mathematics.

title: PHYSICS
de_requirements: NCE merit in Physics/Mathematics, Physics/Chemistry and Physics/Computer. Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Physics and any of  Mathematics, Computer Science and Chemistry. ND/HND in Physics, Physics Electronics or any related course.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics and any other Science subject from Further Mathematics, Biology or Agricultural Science, Geography and Electronics.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics and Chemistry or Biology.

title: PHYSIOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Chemistry, Physics and Biology/Zoology.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Maths, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology

title: PHYSIOTHERAPY
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level grade C' passes chosen from Physics, Chemistry and Biology. Diploma from Medical Rehabilitation Therapist Board (MRTB) accredited programmes. A minimum of second class lower degree in any of the Basic Medical Sciences from University of Medical Sciences or any recognized University.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Physics and Chemistry in not more than two sittings.
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

title: POLITICAL SCIENCE
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes including Government/History or Civic Education. NCE merit in a relevant field. HND/Diploma in Public/Local Government Administration, International Relation or any appropriate course.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Government/History/Civic Education, English Language and three (3) other Social Science or Arts subjects.  A pass in Mathematics is required.
subjects: Government/History/Civic Education plus two (2) other Social Science/Arts subjects.

title: PUBLIC ADMINISTRATION
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes including Economics/Government/ Civic Education and any Art or Social Science subject. HND/Diploma in Public Administration, Public Health, and Social Policy or any related field. NCE merit in a related course.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Government/History/Civic Education and two (2) relevant subjects.
subjects: Government/Civic Education, Economics and any other Social Science subject

title: SCIENCE EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i)     Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant Science subjects which should include candidates proposed course.

(ii)   NCE credit/merit in addition to TC II merit or 'O' Level credit in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes including English Language, Mathematics and two (2) other Science subjects.
subjects: Three (3) relevant Science or NBC subjects

title: SOCIOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes including Government or History.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Government or History, English Language and three (3) other subjects.  A pass in Mathematics is required.
subjects: Three (3) Social Science or Arts subjects.

title: SOCIOLOGY & ANTHROPOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes including Government or History.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Government or History, English Language and three (3) other subjects.  A pass in Mathematics is required.
subjects: Three (3) Social Science or Arts Subjects.

title: STATISTICS
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes to include Mathematics or Statistics.

NCE credit in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics and at least three (3) subjects from Physics, Statistics, Chemistry, Further Mathematics, Economics and Geography.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry and Economics.

title: TEACHER EDUCATION SCIENCE:
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant teaching subjects including Literature in English.

(ii)  NCE credit or merit in two(2)relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language and Literature in English plus three (3) other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Literature in English and one (1) Art and any other subject.
